name: mm
description: mock mate, mock http request, fs access and so on.

scripts.test: npm run lint && mocha --check-leaks -R spec -t 5000 -r should-http -r co-mocha test/*.test.js
scripts.test-cov: istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --check-leaks -t 5000 -r should-http -r co-mocha test/*.test.js
scripts.test-travis: npm run lint && istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --check-leaks -t 5000 -r should-http -r co-mocha test/*.test.js

author: fengmk2 <fengmk2@gmail.com> (http://fengmk2.com/)
